items.content_text:
### Installing

*   [Home Assistant Installation](https://www.home-assistant.io/installation/) - The official installation guides.
*   [Compare Installation Methods](https://www.home-assistant.io/installation/#compare-installation-methods) - The available installation methods compared.

### Public Configurations / Other Communities

*   [Klaas Schoute (‚≠ê220)](https://github.com/klaasnicolaas/Student-homeassistant-config) - Hass.io based, Intel NUC, Ubuntu Server, Docker and regularly updated.

### Add-ons / Third Party Add-ons

*   [EmonCMS (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/inverse/hassio-addon-emoncms) - A powerful open-source web app for processing, logging, and visualizing energy, temperature, and other environmental data.

### Dashboards / Third Party Add-ons

*   [Dashboards Documentation](https://www.home-assistant.io/dashboards/) - The official documentation.

### Dashboards / Custom Cards

*   [Card Modder (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/thomasloven/lovelace-card-mod) - Style your Lovelace cards.
*   [Atomic Calendar Revive (‚≠ê526)](https://github.com/totaldebug/atomic-calendar-revive) - Calendar card with advanced settings.
*   [Vacuum Map Card (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/PiotrMachowski/Home-Assistant-Lovelace-Xiaomi-Vacuum-Map-card) - This card provides a user-friendly way to fully control Xiaomi (Roborock/Viomi/Dreame/Roidmi) and Neato (+ possibly other) vacuums.
*   [Raspberry Pi Status Card (‚≠ê216)](https://github.com/ironsheep/lovelace-rpi-monitor-card) - Show status of your Raspberry Pis.

### Custom Integrations / Alternative Dashboards

*   [HACS](https://hacs.xyz/) - This is a manager for your custom integration (components) and plugin (lovelace elements) needs.
*   [Xiaomi Cloud Map Extractor (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/PiotrMachowski/Home-Assistant-custom-components-Xiaomi-Cloud-Map-Extractor) - Presents a live view of a map for Xiaomi (Roborock/Viomi/Roidmi/Dreame) vacuums without a need for rooting.

### DIY / Alternative Dashboards

*   [Tasmota (‚≠ê23k)](https://github.com/arendst/Tasmota) - Firmware for ESP8266 boards and devices.

### Online Resources / YouTube Channels

*   [Home Assistant](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCbX3YkedQunLt7EQAdVxh7w) - Official YouTube Channel where new launches and live streams are held.
*   [Everything Smart Home](https://www.youtube.com/c/EverythingSmartHome) - Focuses on Smart Home, Home Automation, general tech reviews, guides, and step-by-step DIY projects.

### Other Awesome Lists / Twitter

*   [awesome-selfhosted (‚≠ê236k)](https://github.com/awesome-selfhosted/awesome-selfhosted) - Curated list of awesome self hosted software.

*   [TellStick (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/tellstick/DOCS.md) - Run a TellStick and TellStick Duo service.
*   [Ada (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/ada/DOCS.md) - Ada is voice assistant powered by Almond which is open and privacy-preserving.

*   [HomeMatic (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/homematic/DOCS.md) - HomeMatic central based on OCCU.
*   [Let's Encrypt (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/letsencrypt/DOCS.md) - Get a free SSL certificate from Let's Encrypt; an open and automated certificate authority (CA).
*   [MariaDB (‚≠ê1.7k)](https://github.com/home-assistant/hassio-addons/blob/master/mariadb/DOCS.md) - An open source relational database (fork of MySQL).

items.content_text:
### In case you need help / Official Communities

*   [Home Assistant Discord](https://discordapp.com/invite/c5DvZ4e) - Join the chat, most of us are there.
*   [Home Assistant Community](https://community.home-assistant.io/?u=frenck) - The discussion forum, also used for feature requests.
*   [Home Assistant Subreddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/homeassistant/) - If you are into Reddit, subscribe.

### In case you need help / Other Communities

*   [Dr. ZZs](https://www.facebook.com/groups/1969622823351838/) - Facebook group by Dr. Zzs.
*   [ESPHome Discord](https://discord.gg/KhAMKrd) - Get support for your DIY ESPHome project.

### Public Configurations / Other Communities

*   [Carlo Costanzo (‚≠ê5k)](https://github.com/CCOSTAN/Home-AssistantConfig#logo) - Probably the most documented configuration out there.
*   [DubhAd (‚≠ê655)](https://github.com/DubhAd/Home-AssistantConfig) - Also known as Tinkerer shares his configuration files.
*   [geekofweek (‚≠ê1.4k)](https://github.com/geekofweek/homeassistant) - Has over 300+ automations.
*   [Mahasri Kalavala (‚≠ê271)](https://github.com/skalavala/mysmarthome) - Impressive setup, with lots of different hardware working together.
*   [Alok Saboo (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/arsaboo/homeassistant-config) - Also known as arsaboo. Regularly updated.
*   [Aaron Bach (‚≠ê278)](https://github.com/bachya/smart-home) - Also known as bachya. Regularly updated and includes numerous Dockerized services.
*   [Franck Nijhof (‚≠ê1.9k)](https://github.com/frenck/home-assistant-config) - Hass.io based, very different configuration structure compared to others.

### Add-ons / Third Party Add-ons

*   [SSH & Web Terminal (‚≠ê423)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-ssh) - SSH and Web-based terminal with tons of pre-loaded useful tools.
*   [UniFi Controller (‚≠ê309)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-unifi) - The UniFi Controller allows you to manage your UniFi network using a web browser.
*   [Node-RED (‚≠ê584)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-node-red) - Flow-based programming for the Internet of Things.
*   [Plex Media Server (‚≠ê170)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-plex) - Your recorded media beautifully organized and ready to stream.
*   [IDE (‚≠ê61)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-ide) - Advanced web-based IDE, based on Cloud9 IDE.
*   [Dasshio (‚≠ê201)](https://github.com/danimtb/dasshio) - Easily use your Amazon Dash Buttons.
*   [InfluxDB (‚≠ê176)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-influxdb) - Scalable datastore for metrics, events, and real-time analytics.
*   [Grafana (‚≠ê255)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-grafana) - Open platform for beautiful analytics and monitoring.
*   [Tor (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-tor) - Protect your privacy and access your instance via Tor.
*   [Spotify Connect (‚≠ê226)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-spotify-connect) - Spotify Connect client for playing music on your Home Assistant device.
*   [zigbee2mqtt (‚≠ê568)](https://github.com/danielwelch/hassio-zigbee2mqtt) - Zigbee to MQTT bridge, get rid of your proprietary Zigbee bridges.
*   [TasmoAdmin (‚≠ê246)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-tasmoadmin) - Centrally manage all your Sonoff-Tasmota devices.
*   [Aircast (‚≠ê356)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-aircast) - AirPlay capabilities for your Chromecast players.
*   [AirSonos (‚≠ê96)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-airsonos) - AirPlay capabilities for your Sonos players.
*   [Dropbox Sync (‚≠ê134)](https://github.com/danielwelch/hassio-dropbox-sync) - Upload your backup snapshots to Dropbox.
*   [Log Viewer (‚≠ê85)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-log-viewer) - Browser-based live log viewing utility.
*   [Tautulli (‚≠ê43)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-tautulli) - Monitor and get statistics from your Plex server.
*   [motionEye (‚≠ê306)](https://github.com/hassio-addons/addon-motioneye) - Simple, elegant and feature-rich CCTV/NVR for your cameras.
